title: chaalu chaalu
sahitya:
cAlu cAlu nI yuktulu naDuvadu sArasAkSa shrI krSNa



anupallavi



shUla dharAdula karudaina mammugUDi sukhamulanu bhavimpave

shrI krSNa



caraNam 1



Adhara radanamula gani sokkucu mE mAsinci vaccitimi budha

rakSaka 

      shalya sArathya monarinci bonku-tEruga maitimi shrI krSNa



caraNam 2



kaNDa cakkera vanTi balukulu vini mEmu kAminci vaccitimi 

     unDiyuNDi bAluni gilli mari toTla ucunaderuga maitimi shrI

krSNa



caraNam 3



tyAgarAja nutuDani ati prematO tarunulu vaccitimi bhOgi

shayana

     mA mATalu mIraku buddhishAli vaudusum  shrI krSNa
